comment: It is unfortunate that on this great platform, there are people who carry toxic hatred for other people but that is unfortunately what happens in a FREE society. I am not a Jew, but I am sorry that you have to endure this kind of poison.
amr:
# ::snt It is unfortunate that on this great platform, there are people who carry toxic hatred for other people but that is unfortunately what happens in a FREE society. I am not a Jew, but I am sorry that you have to endure this kind of poison.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (f / fortunate-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG2 (c2 / carry-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person)
                        :ARG1 (h / hate-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                    :mod (o / other))
                              :mod (t / toxic))
                        :location (p3 / platform
                              :mod (g / great)
                              :mod (t2 / this))))
            :ARG2 (f2 / fortunate-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG2 c2
                  :location (s / society
                        :ARG1-of (f3 / free-04))))
      :snt2 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (r / religious-group
                  :polarity -
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Jew")
                  :domain (ii / i))
            :ARG2 (s2 / sorry-01
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :ARG2 (o2 / obligate-01
                        :ARG1 (y / you)
                        :ARG2 (e / endure-01
                              :ARG1 y
                              :ARG2 (p4 / poison
                                    :mod (k / kind
                                          :mod (t3 / this))))))))

comment: Wilfred your team was CRUSHED DECISIVELY, and I fear we may have to do it again......
